content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that during our discussion today we will focus solely on the rental price negotiation, as per the given scenario constraints. Now, if you have an initial price in mind, please feel free to propose it. Should we not reach an agreement, remember to use 'TERMINATE' to conclude the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
